title: What education technology resources should teachers know about? - Quora

response.answer_text: For more learning resources Khan Academy lets you access educational videos on a wide range of subjects. LibriVox has a huge collection of public domain audiobooks. Sophia has a lot of educational materials. It also lets you create content (e.g., tutorials and quizzes) and collaborate with your students.  OpenIntro provides free statistics textbooks (in pdf format) with videos and tutorials. For presentations Visme lets you create engaging visual presentations, infographics, reports and more. Pixton Comic Maker enables you to create comics for an engaging learning experience.  For collaboration Edmodo helps you collaborate with students and parents online. For more interesting educational stuff in the internet, check out the list I made: Where the Free Things Are
